des: "You'd never know these yummy little balls are actually healthy! With the main ingredients being wheat germ and peanut butter, they are full of protein! Kids love them! Add chocolate chips, raisins, or coconut to the mix. Rolling in coconut is also delicious!"
ins:
Mix wheat germ, peanut butter, honey, and milk powder together in a bowl; shape into bite-size balls. Arrange balls on a plate.
Place in the freezer until solid, at least 1 hour.
